decision_conditions: 1	The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s):

Cover Letter, Approved Ground & First Floor Plan, Approved Second Floor & Roof Plan, Approved Elevations, Location Plan Rev A (14/10/24), Proposed Ground & First Floor Plan Rev A (14/10/24), Proposed Second Floor & Roof Plan Rev A (14/10/24), Proposed Elevations Rev A (14/10/24)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission reference 241447FUL dated 17.09.2024 for 'Construction of a three-storey building to accommodate 5no. self-contained flats, with associated car parking, refuse and cycle storage, amenity space and associated changes to the boundary treatment (following demolition of existing building)'. Amendment seeks replacement of aluminium windows and doors with uPVC double-glazed windows in an anthracite colour frame; addition of a canopy over the side entrance door to the flats; relocation of the side entrance door to the ground floor Flat 01 to the front elevation; replacement of the ground floor rear flat bedroom doors with windows, and changes to the first floor rear bedroom; removal of side windows along the front bay; replacement of the mono-pitched roof with a flat roof over the ground floor rear Flat 02 bedrooms
